scripts.db:console: docker compose run postgres psql -h localhost -U postgres -d asgard_db
scripts.docker:db:migrate: docker compose run asgard pnpm db:migrate
scripts.docker:db:migrate:undo: docker compose run asgard pnpx knex migrate:down
scripts.docker:seed:dev: docker compose run asgard pnpm ts-node scripts/seed/dev.ts
scripts.rebuild:be: docker compose build asgard && docker compose rm --force --stop asgard && docker compose up -d asgard
scripts.start:dev: pnpm docker:db:migrate && pnpm docker:seed:dev && pnpm rebuild:be
